attributes.action: Close down the fixated threat assessment centre and pay compensation to their victims.
attributes.additional_details: The Fixated Threat Assessment Centre is a totally undemocratic organisation which ignores the basic Human Rights of it's victims. They also disregard the principals as laid out in the Magna Carta. Under English Law a person is susposed to be innocent until proven Guilty and when being arrested a person is supposed to have access to solicitor. Victims should also receive componsation.
